message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. If you decide to proceed, I would like to propose a transaction price of $950,000. This amount reflects my desire to ensure a fair deal while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I trust this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you throughout this process.
